##Load the libraries we need: tidyverse and palmerpenguins
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
penguins
```

##What are the dimensions of `penguins`?
```{r}
dim(penguins)
```

##What are the names of the variables?
```{r}
names(penguins)
```


```{r}
str(penguins)
```
```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```
##How many individuals are on each island? 

```{r}
penguins <- penguins
```

Assigning the data to an object lets you look at the data in a spreadsheet form 
```{r}
penguins
```

```{r}
table(penguins$island)
```

Using the table function to tell me the isalnds measured and the number of individuals in each 

```{r}
summary(penguins$island)
```

##What is the mean body mass of penguins? 
```{r}
mean(penguins$body_mass_g, na.rm=T)
```
